techs.name: Tech.Basicinfantryequipment
techs.quote: Primary infantry equipment developed during World War I.

techs.name: Tech.InfantryEquipmentI
techs.quote: Infantry weapons used by individuals and troops, and other equipment required by soldiers.

techs.name: Tech.InfantryEquipmentII
techs.quote: Infantry weapons used by individuals and troops, and other equipment required by soldiers. More modern, with a massive addition of submachine guns and anti-tank rifle.

techs.name: Tech.ImprovedInfantryEquipmentII
techs.quote: The unit or heavy weapon used by infantry includes other miscellaneous equipment required; the weapon is of a more advanced type and the equipment is more professional.

techs.name: Tech.AntitankrifleI
techs.quote: Equipping our infantry units with anti-tank rifle will allow them to fight light armoured vehicles without losing power.

techs.name: Tech.InfantryEquipmentIII
techs.quote: The unit or heavy weapon used by infantry includes other miscellaneous equipment required; the weapon is of a more advanced type and the equipment is more professional.

techs.name: Tech.AntitankrifleII
techs.quote: For infantry to be effective against heavier armoured vehicles, smaller hollow-charge weapons must be manufactured.

techs.name: Tech.ImprovedInfantryEquipmentIII
techs.quote: The units or heavy weapons used by infantry include other miscellaneous equipment required; advanced weapons such as assault rifles and anti-tank rocket launchers; and the spread of small-range weapons.
